name: Olivia
overview: Olivia is a British-American children's animated television series produced by media company Chorion and based on Ian Falconer's books. It is seen on Nick Jr. in the US, Milkshake!, Nick Jr. in the UK and Ireland, and Disney Junior in Latin America and Brazil, Treehouse TV in Canada. The show has won a silver Parents' Choice Award for its positive story lines and characters. New episode are airing on Nick JR in 2013.

episodes.name: Olivia Measures Up
episodes.overview: In the series opener of this cartoon about an adventurous young pig with a vivid imagination, Olivia tries to stop her little brother from growing.

episodes.name: Olivia Plays Hotel
episodes.overview: Olivia transforms her home into a make-believe hotel and entertains her friends at the establishment.

episodes.name: Olivia's Ice Spectacular
episodes.overview: The ice-skating show Olivia wants to see gets canceled, so she stages her own show in her backyard.

episodes.name: Olivia's Snow Day
episodes.overview: When school is closed because of snowfall, Olivia pretends to be a reporter and investigates a story about the abominable snowman.

episodes.name: Olivia's Magic Act
episodes.overview: Olivia performs magic tricks, including one where she makes herself disappear.

episodes.name: Olivia and the School Concert
episodes.overview: Olivia helps Ian overcome his stage fright so he can perform his celery song at the school concert.

episodes.name: Olivia Visits the Aquarium
episodes.overview: Olivia and her classmates compete on a class trip to the aquarium.

episodes.name: Olivia Goes International
episodes.overview: Olivia decides to invent her own country.

episodes.name: Olivia and the Crystal Ball
episodes.overview: William accidentally breaks Dad's bowling trophy, and Olivia worries that he will be arrested.

episodes.name: Olivia Plays Soccer
episodes.overview: Olivia is upset when Francine is chosen over her to play goalie in soccer.

episodes.name: The Two Olivias
episodes.overview: A new girl in Olivia's class shares her name, causing Olivia much confusion.

episodes.name: Olivia Tends to the Sick
episodes.overview: Olivia comes up with some silly treatments to cure Julian's itchy foot.

episodes.name: Olivia Makes a Video
episodes.overview: Olivia makes a video diary for her dad while he's out of town.

episodes.name: Olivia Takes a Road Trip
episodes.overview: Olivia transforms her home into a make-believe hotel and entertains her friends at the establishment.

episodes.name: Olivia Goes Camping
episodes.overview: Olivia takes inexperienced camper Francine with her on her family's camping trip.

episodes.name: Olivia Plays Vet
episodes.overview: Olivia decides to become a veterinarian, so she practices on her pets.

episodes.name: Olivia Packs Up
episodes.overview: Fed up with sharing, Olivia tries to find a place free from little brothers.

episodes.name: Olivia Is Invited to Dinner
episodes.overview: Olivia is invited to Francine's for dinner, but then she worries about reciprocating.

episodes.name: Olivia the Pet Monitor
episodes.overview: Olivia and Francine compete to be the classroom pet monitor.

episodes.name: Olivia and the Anniversary Surprise
episodes.overview: Olivia's parents go to a restaurant for their anniversary.

episodes.name: Olivia Paints a Mural
episodes.overview: Olivia decides to become a painter, but she worries about space issues after seeing a mural.

episodes.name: Olivia's Day at the Office
episodes.overview: Olivia and Ian accompany their father to work, and Olivia tries to help her dad with a new project he's been assigned.

episodes.name: Olivia Leads a Parade
episodes.overview: Olivia, Ian and Julian create their own backyard parade.

episodes.name: Olivia the Nature Photographer
episodes.overview: Olivia and Julian camp out in the backyard to photograph wild animals... However, her annoying brother scares one away.

episodes.name: Olivia's Good Luck
episodes.overview: Olivia wants to sell more cookies than anyone else in her Young Pioneers troupe. Also, she loses her so called lucky tights.

episodes.name: Olivia Explores Outer Space
episodes.overview: Olivia creates a model of the entire solar system for a school project.

episodes.name: Olivia Plays Piano
episodes.overview: Olivia's piano teacher wants her to practice.

episodes.name: Olivia Trains Her Cat
episodes.overview: Olivia searches for her missing cat.

episodes.name: Olivia and Her Ducklings
episodes.overview: Olivia and Ian try to keep a family of ducks a secret from Mother and Father.

episodes.name: Olivia Takes Ballet
episodes.overview: Olivia recruits Uncle Garret as a ballet partner.

episodes.name: Olivia Helps Mother Nature
episodes.overview: Olivia puts herself and Julian on a training regimen as they prepare for their school's track-and-field day.

episodes.name: Olivia Gets Fit
episodes.overview: Olivia makes it her mission to recycle and conserve energy.

episodes.name: Olivia Becomes a Chef
episodes.overview: Olivia, Ian and their father cook a special meal for her mother's birthday

episodes.name: Olivia and the Babies
episodes.overview: Olivia pretends that her cat and her dog are her babies and develops some useful maternal skills.

episodes.name: Olivia Acts Out
episodes.overview: Olivia must make the most of her small part in the school play.

episodes.name: Olivia and Grandma's Visit
episodes.overview: Olivia has to give up her bedroom when her grandmother comes to visit.

episodes.name: Olivia and Her Alien Brother
episodes.overview: After a trip to the planetarium, Olivia begins to believe that Ian is an alien.

episodes.name: Olivia's Lemonade Stand
episodes.overview: Olivia is upset when her lemonade stand loses customers to Francine's pink lemonade stand.

episodes.name: Olivia Runs a Carnival
episodes.overview: Olivia oversees the construction of games and amusements for her school carnival.

episodes.name: Olivia Explores the Attic
episodes.overview: Olivia discovers her grandmother's time capsule hidden in the attic.

episodes.name: Olivia Plants a Garden
episodes.overview: Olivia makes a discovery when Perry digs up her garden.

episodes.name: Olivia's Pirate Treasure
episodes.overview: Olivia, Ian and Julian pretend that they are pirates while at the beach.

episodes.name: Olivia and the Old West
episodes.overview: Olivia is left in charge while Mrs. Hogenmuller searches for the class bullfrog.

episodes.name: Olivia's Fashion Show
episodes.overview: Olivia is determined to put on her own fashion show.

episodes.name: Olivia and the Family Photo
episodes.overview: Olivia's mother attempts to take a family Christmas photo in the middle of summer.

episodes.name: Olivia Claus
episodes.overview: Olivia imagines that she is a Santa Claus who returns lost toys.

episodes.name: Olivia Goes to the Beach
episodes.overview: Grandma takes Olivia and Ian to a special beach.

episodes.name: Olivia Keeps a Secret
episodes.overview: Olivia wants to help plan Francine's birthday party.

episodes.name: Olivia Goes to the Library
episodes.overview: On a trip to the library, Olivia hopes to renew her fantastic book so she can finish it.

episodes.name: Olivia Makes a Wedding Gift
episodes.overview: Olivia wants to find the perfect wedding present for Miss Davis.

episodes.name: Olivia Talks Turkey
episodes.overview: Olivia takes up into a new hobby with a turkey calling, and Olivia sings Opera with her pet Turkey.

episodes.name: Olivia Takes a Hike
episodes.overview: Olivia's Father accompanies her and Francine at they turn into Pioneer Scouts.

episodes.name: Olivia Builds a Snowlady
episodes.overview: Olivia resorts to building a snowman out of cotton candy because the snow has melted.

episodes.name: Olivia and the Treasure Hunt
episodes.overview: Olivia's family participates in a town-wide treasure hunt, which involves searching for clues and doing goofy tricks.

episodes.name: Olivia's Old West Treasure Hunt
episodes.overview: Olivia and her classmates look for a lost key to the school bus and find a hidden treasure.

episodes.name: Olivia Makes it Rain
episodes.overview: Olivia plans to attend a toy-boat race, but a problem arises: The pond has no water.

episodes.name: Olivia's Kite Party
episodes.overview: Olivia and her pals want to fly their kites, but the wind has stopped blowing.

episodes.name: Olivia Builds a House
episodes.overview: Olivia and Ian try to rebuild their father's broken scale-model house, but they build it on a much larger scale.

episodes.name: Tip Top Tapper
episodes.overview: Olivia injures her leg before her tap-dance recital, but she finds a clever way to perform.

episodes.name: Olivia Plans a Tea Party
episodes.overview: Olivia fills in for her ill mom and hosts a pirate-themed tea party.

episodes.name: Puppy Love
episodes.overview: Olivia plans a canine wedding for Perry, then she has to track down the runaway bride.

episodes.name: Magnificent Magnet Girl
episodes.overview: Olivia misses the chance to buy her dad a collectible comic book for Father's Day, so instead she and her friends act out the story for him.
